actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drider makes one Longsword attack and two Skewer attacks, or it makes three Web Shot attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Skewer
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Web Shot
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d10+3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 STR save or be restrained by webbing. A creature, including the restrained target, can take its action to break the webbing and free the restrained target by succeeding on a DC 15 STR check.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The drider is resistant to the charmed condition, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The drider is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, and its Perception is 10 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While in contact with a web, the drider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
